welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hampton, where historic charm meets modern excitement! Known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and vibrant local culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Las Olas Taqueria
restaurants.description: Las Olas Taqueria is a taco restaurant located in Hampton.

restaurants.name: The Old Salt at Lamie's Inn
restaurants.description: The Old Salt at Lamie's Inn is a american restaurant located in Hampton.
restaurants.address: 490 Lafayette Rd (at Exeter Rd), Hampton, NH 03842

restaurants.name: Hoaty's of Hampton
restaurants.description: Hoaty's of Hampton is a breakfast spot located in Hampton.

restaurants.name: Dunkin'
restaurants.description: Dunkin' is a donut shop located in Hampton.

restaurants.name: Galley Hatch Restaurant
restaurants.description: Galley Hatch Restaurant is a seafood restaurant located in Hampton.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newport News/Williamsburg Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Newport News/Williamsburg Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free airport WiFi network by selecting 'PHF_Free_WiFi' from their device's network list.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norfolk International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C primarily serves domestic flights operated by United Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Felker AAF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Felker AAF Airport is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence County Airpark Airport offers a comfortable waiting area for passengers and a small snack bar.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lawrence County Airpark Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a luxurious lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities such as shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for military use and is not open to the public.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
